روح.name: Rouh
روح.description: Grandfather Younis tries to heal the family's wounds after their daughter, who has Down syndrome, is involved in a tragic accident that turns their lives upside down.

العائلة X.name: Family X
العائلة X.description: A widow in her forties searches for her missing teenage son, uncovering his secrets and his own world.

اقتحام.name: Intrusion
اقتحام.description: The doors are closed to Zahra, so she and her father decide to rob a bank to secure treatment for her sick daughter. She finds herself trapped while holding hostages, uncovering intertwined threads of crimes and mafia controlling money and destinies.

عشتار.name: Ashitar
عشتار.description: Between life's first blows and success... the journey of a wrestling champion in revealing the secrets of darkness and overcoming challenges.

ولاية بطيخ.name: Watermelon Province
ولاية بطيخ.description: A new season of the comedy program "Watermelon Province" addresses Iraqi social and economic issues.

أبجد هوس.name: Abgad Hawas
أبجد هوس.description: A group of seniors decides to join a literacy school to learn reading and writing, leading to exciting comic situations.

بطولة 1001 فيفا 2023 في العراق.name: 1001 FIFA Championship 2023 in Iraq
بطولة 1001 فيفا 2023 في العراق.description: A battle for the title between 16 contestants who reached the final rounds out of 512 participants in electronic sports competitions. Fierce matches, accompanied by a commentator who narrates their details, followed by an analytical studio, as if you were watching real matches broadcast live.

محتوى خابط.name: Nonsense Content
محتوى خابط.description: Assorted scenes mixing comedy with drama and different stories in each episode revolving around family and married life.

الخوات.name: The Sisters
الخوات.description: After more than twenty years, the daughters of Younis Fayyad gather to attend his condolence council, but something prompts them to stay, forcing them to choose between parting again or facing destiny.

مجنون سارة.name: Crazy Sarah
مجنون سارة.description: Love at first sight leads Saif to fall in love with Sarah when she joins him at work in an advertising company. The security they feel quickly swept away by the tide of hatred and malice after they declare their feelings. Who seeks to destroy their relationship, and where will the chapters of their story end?

خارج التغطية M&M.name: Out of Coverage M&M
خارج التغطية M&M.description: Millions and her daughter Maha explore unique tourist destinations and rare landmarks, mingling with the inhabitants of those destinations to learn about their customs and traditions. Trips full of challenge and adventure, enhanced with a description of each trip's details.
